Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute near 103rd/Aberdeen
ShortDescription: Revised: 103 West 103rd buses temp. rrtd EB: 103rd, Aberdeen, 101st, Halsted & 103rd; WB: 103rd, Halsted, 101st, May & 103rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: #103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to fire dept. activity at 103rd/Aberdeen.

Eastbound buses will operate via 103rd, Aberdeen, 101st, Halsted, then resume their normal route on 103rd.

Westbound buses will operate via 103rd, Halsted, 101st, May, then resume their normal route on 103rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Reroute at 111th/Whipple
ShortDescription: #112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 111th, Kedzie, 115th, Western, and 111th, due to street blockage near 111th/Whipple.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 111th, Kedzie, 115th, Western, and 111th, due to street blockage near 111th/Whipple.

Allow extra travel time.
